text: Biruta Lewaszkiewicz-Petrykowska (26 August 1927 – 9 June 2022) was a Polish lawyer, academic and politician. She was a professor at University of Łódź. She was also Judge of the Polish Constitutional Tribunal from 1997 until 2006. Lewaszkiewicz-Petrykowska was born in Kraków, Poland. Lewaszkiewicz- Petrykowska died on 9 June 2022 in Kraków at the age of 94.Uniwersytet Łódzki: zmarła legenda uczelni, prof.
